quizzes.title: AI Fundamentals Quiz
quizzes.description: Test your understanding of basic AI concepts, history, and applications covered in the introduction chapter.

questionData.question: What does AI stand for?
questionData.explanation: AI stands for Artificial Intelligence, which refers to the simulation of human intelligence in machines.

questionData.question: Which of the following is considered the father of AI?
questionData.explanation: John McCarthy coined the term 'Artificial Intelligence' and is often considered the father of AI.

quizzes.title: Machine Learning Concepts Quiz
quizzes.description: Evaluate your knowledge of ML algorithms, supervised and unsupervised learning methods from chapter 2.

questionData.question: What is the main difference between supervised and unsupervised learning?
options: Supervised learning uses labeled data, unsupervised doesn't
Supervised learning is faster than unsupervised
questionData.explanation: Supervised learning uses labeled training data, while unsupervised learning finds patterns in unlabeled data.

quizzes.title: Neural Networks Deep Dive Quiz
quizzes.description: Challenge yourself with neural network architectures and deep learning concepts from chapter 3.

questionData.question: What is the purpose of an activation function in a neural network?
questionData.explanation: Activation functions introduce non-linearity to neural networks, allowing them to learn complex patterns.

quizzes.title: Practical AI Applications Quiz
quizzes.description: Apply your knowledge to real-world AI scenarios and case studies from chapter 4.

questionData.question: Which AI application is most commonly used in image recognition?
questionData.explanation: Computer Vision is the AI field that deals with enabling computers to interpret and understand visual information.

quizzes.title: Final Comprehensive Assessment
quizzes.description: Comprehensive evaluation covering all course topics and advanced problem-solving scenarios.

questionData.question: In a comprehensive AI system, which component is responsible for learning from data?
questionData.explanation: The Machine Learning Module is responsible for learning patterns and making predictions from data.
